POSTGRADUATE PROGRAMME
======================

We also offer Master and Phd programmes. The Master programme geared towards industry or business professionals with cutting-edge curriculum.  The PhD programme is designed for those seeking academic research and teaching careers as faculty in the study of management and technology in higher learning education.

We also offer Master and Phd programmes.
